preclusion: LI5101 Supply Chain Management Thinking and Practice
description:
The Logistics and Supply Chain industry is facing
immense changes. Emerging technologies, new markets
and business models, and rising customer expectations
bring both risks and opportunities for companies all over
the world. This module focuses on the emerging trends
and challenges that companies have to face and the
impact on their logistics and supply chain management,
and introduce transformational strategies to enhance their
competitiveness.
title: Transformational Strategies for Supply Chains
